title: Step Functions to Athena
description: Create a Step Functions workflow to query Amazon Athena.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern deploys an Amazon API Gateway REST with a VPC Link V2 integration and a Load Balancer
The new feature of November 2025 now allows REST APIs to be integrated directly with ALBs through a VPC Link V2 integration
The VPC Link V2 now supports both Network Load Balancer and Application Load Balancers, and can be used for both REST APIs and HTTP APIs
